CS:GO is a really good and fun game. If you are into first person shooters, this is definitely the game for you. The game is easy to find out, and also really easy to play with his friends in. People are friendly and nice, and by that I do not mean the 6 year old kids you unfortunately sometimes get to play with if you take a random competitive. But if you are lucky not to come with small children the game is really really good!
